title: Never Trust the Science
author: VD
content_html:
Remember, /pol/ is always right.

We have a word for science that can be trusted. That word is “engineering”. If the science hasn’t yet reached a point at which engineers can utilize it, it cannot be trusted.

DISCUSS ON SG
